detaileddescription.para: This page lists the guidelines to keep in mind when writing path modifiers, to help minimize bugs and keep compability between modifiers high.

listitem.para: The Path::path array should not be changed by any modifier. It could be changed to another valid path in extreme cases, but that's the only valid change.
If the output is StrictVectorPath, the Path::vectorPath should have the same length as the Path::path array, think of it as the positions of the nodes have been modified.
None should not be the output of any modifier.
